remarks: Ordinal addition absorbs a natural number added to the left of a transfinite number.  Proposition 8.10 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 59. (Contributed by NM, 9-Dec-2004.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 29-May-2015.)
statement: oaabs $p |- ( ( ( A e. _om /\ B e. On ) /\ _om C_ B ) -> ( A +o B ) = B ) $.
